# Modular Expansion

Modular expansion is the narrative under Celestia. It includes the many "Rollup-as-a-service" startups such as Initia, Conduit, Caldera, and AltLayer. [Dymension](https://dymension.xyz/) is similar, but for Cosmos app chains.
